copy.desc17001: Celebrate any occasion with the festive pennants of this party. The perfect choice for any get-together!
copy.desc17002: Fill your home with the sweet aroma of flowers with this party. Great for tea parties and garden parties.
copy.desc17003: Decorate your home in a beautiful glow with this party. Great for dinner with friends and pajama parties.
copy.desc17004: Decorate your home with a soft blanket of snow. Perfect for adding a wintry touch to your holiday parties!
copy.desc17005: Drape your home with a garland of flowers. The best way to celebrate the beginning of the blooming season!
copy.desc17006: Beautiful summer blossoms make your home the perfect place to party with your pixie pals!
copy.desc17007: Crisp autumn leaves are an exquisite addition to your home. Great for your fanciest get-togethers!
copy.desc13012: Things are heating up, don't be the last one holding the popcorn! For 3-12 players
copy.desc13013: Do what Simone does, but only if she says Simone Says! For 2-12 players
copy.desc13016: Classic fun with a Fairy twist. For 2-12 players
copy.desc13017: Be the first player to get rid of all your cards by matching the colors or numbers. For 2-4 players
copy.desc13018: Test your memory by finding matching pairs. For 2 players.
copy.desc13019: Can you beat Rochelle at her own game? Win Meadow Grass, Honeycombs, or Sunflower Seeds. (2-12 Players)
